title: Does the irremediable "Mexican blood flu" cause a health crisis on the southern border?
subtitle: The allegations of a serious border outbreak between the United States and Mexico confuse inaccurate allegations by politicians with the allegations of the publisher of complementary conspiracies.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: There is a form of tuberculosis called Mexican flu, which is being brought to the United States by immigrants crossing the southern border.
